name: GetArchivedFileStatistics
description:
Retrieve statistics about archived Zoom meeting files.

Use this tool to obtain statistics regarding archived meeting or webinar files for a Zoom account. This is useful for compliance purposes, such as FINRA requirements. Prerequisites include enabling the Meeting and Webinar Archiving feature and appropriate admin scopes.

parameters.name: query_start_date
parameters.description: The start date for querying archived files, formatted as `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ`. Must be within seven days of `query_end_date`.

value_schema.description: The query start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `to` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

parameters.name: query_end_date
parameters.description: The query end date for retrieving statistics, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. Ensure the duration between this and the start date does not exceed seven days.

value_schema.description: The query end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `from` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The query start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `to` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

value_schema.description: The query start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `to` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The query end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `from` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

value_schema.description: The query end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ` format. This value and the `from` query parameter value cannot exceed seven days.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
